title: The hunchback of notre dame
content: The hunchback of notre dame Victor Hugo The hunchback of notre dame Here is the haunting drama of Quasimodo, the hunchback; Esmeralda, the gypsy dancer; and Claude Frollo, the priest tortured by his own damnation. Shaped by a profound sense of tragic irony, it is a work that gives full play to the author's brilliant imagination.
